Submit a Story

We'd love to read your story! To submit your work for publication on Cheekypubs, please follow the instructions below.

üìß How to Submit

Send your story via email to:

cheekypubs@gmail.com

üìù What to Include

Please include the following information in your email:

  • Title ‚Äî The title of your story
  • Author Name ‚Äî Your pen name (or "Anonymous" if you prefer)
  • Tags ‚Äî Categories that describe your story (e.g., romance, drama, fiction, m/f, f/f, school, office)
  • Story Content ‚Äî The body of your story, formatted in Markdown

‚úçÔ∏è Formatting Your Story

We use Markdown for formatting. Here are some basics:

**bold text** ‚Üí bold text
*italic text* ‚Üí italic text
## Chapter Title ‚Üí Creates a heading
--- ‚Üí Creates a decorative section divider ( ~ * ~ )

Tip: Use --- (three dashes on its own line) to create a scene break or section divider. It will render as a decorative ~ * ~ separator in your published story.

üì∑ Including Images

If you'd like to include images in your story, upload them to a free image hosting service like Imgur, ImgBB, or Postimages, then include the direct image URL in your story using this format:

![Image description](https://i.imgur.com/yourimage.jpg)

üìö Multi-Chapter Stories

If you're submitting a story with multiple chapters, please indicate:

  • That it's part of a series
  • The chapter number
  • An optional chapter title (e.g., "Chapter 1: The Beginning")

‚è±Ô∏è What Happens Next

After you submit your story, we'll review it and publish it to the site. You'll receive a confirmation email once your story is live.
